unnormalised: When sending a courier, remember to always include the complete address, like H.No. 123, 4th Cross Rd, Malleswaram West, Bangalore, Karnataka, PIN 560003 for smooth delivery; incomplete details can cause delays. Also, adding a landmark near the address (e.g., Near Mantri Mall) often helps the delivery person.
normalised: When sending a courier, remember to always include the complete address, like house number one hundred and twenty three, fourth Cross Road, Malleswaram West, Bangalore, Karnataka, P-I-N five hundred and sixty thousand and three for smooth delivery; incomplete details can cause delays. Also, adding a landmark near the address (e.g., Near Mantri Mall) often helps the delivery person.
